subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
author: April Abercrombie
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_0182_01C9E838.C533D1D0
Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="Windows-1252"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

You mean me, April??

Yes and no. It was more of a shadow person, except it=
 was 3D and just head, torso and partial arms. It hovered in front of my hu=
sband and I for a few seconds (we both saw it), then it turned and popped o=
utside the apartment door. I say popped because it made an audible "pop" an=
d the apartment shook as it went out.

I am of the opinion that it was not =
human.

  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: threadsintyme@... 
  T=
o: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Monday, June 08, 2009 12:49 PM
  Subjec=
t: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas






  Amber,

  Have you ever experienced a fu=
ll bodied apparition that interacted with you?
  Al
  ---------- Original M=
essage ----------
  From: "April Abercrombie" <april@abercrombieghostresear=
ch.com>
  To: <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
  Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
=
  Date: Mon, 8 Jun 2009 12:40:32 -0600




  That's awesome! I have yet to =
experience a disembodied voice.

    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From=
: Frank Ratka 
    To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com 
    Sent: Monday, June 08, =
2009 11:49 AM
    Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas


          I recorded a=
t a  100 year old beach house investigation in 2004 and not only heard real=
 time, "Hello" with my ears but caught it on camera and my reaction to it.
=

          Frank R.

          --- On Mon, 6/8/09, Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@gm=
ail.com> wrote:


            From: Zack Widup <w9sz.zack@...>
      =
      Subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] New ideas
            To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.=
com
            Date: Monday, June 8, 2009, 12:40 PM


            I am cur=
ious if anyone with a microphone wired to a remote site has ever gotten any=
 EVP in real time.

            I took part in an investigation of Ashmore =
Estates, near Ashmore IL, on Saturday night. We had six video cameras set u=
p in the three halls of the building. The video for all was being monitored=
 and recorded at a central location. Alas, we did not have microphones at t=
he camera sites conected to the central location. I wonder what we might ha=
ve heard if we did?

            Zack

             
            On Mon, Ju=
n 8, 2009 at 12:05 PM, threadsintyme@ juno.com <Threadsintyme@ juno.com> wr=
ote:


            Let's just agree to end this discussion about her... 
  =
          Why don't we discuss something on a lighter note? Anyone have any=
 new ideas about either evp or ITC? 
            Al

hese great CRM solutions. Click now!
